name: A Night Sky's Symphony
description:
Stars always have a melody to sing. You just have to listenIn this interactive experiement, a sky full of musical stars await

How to play:

  1. Hover your cursor over a star to hear its sound
  2. Click on two stars to link them, draw constellations and make complex musical patterns
  3. You can change the scale, mode and various effects in the menu to change your creating experience

What's next ? 

  • A larger sound palette
  • More granular effect control
  • Auto-player
